title: FS: Young bare hand EPDG low grade - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Young bare hand EPDG low grade - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this low grade Young bare hand EPDG available. Asking $SOLD shipped for him. The top HOFers seem to be getting tougher and tougher to find with off backs….and this one is about as cheap as they come.

Shoot me a PM to discuss or comment sold below.

Anyone saying “I’ll take it” gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

Thanks for looking!
